Sailing Speed Calculator | Dylan Tredger

Sailing Speed Calculator

Calculations and graphs of sailing VMG vs TWA [github]

This repository is a Jupyter Notebook containing basic calculations of Velocity Made Good (VMG) for the most efficient way to sail to a given destination.

The notebook also includes the wind polar graph of a Figaro 3, as well as a generic wave polar (which provides the % of best performance achievable in a given sea-state)
